data.actual_result: sound clip continues playing layered with the next one
data.expected_result: sound clip stops when another clip is played
data.short_description: Sample sounds in settings under notifications dont stop when playing another sample sound, or the same sample sound again before it's finished
data.steps_to_repro: - open settings - go to notifications - click on "outgoing call" 's sample speaker icon multiple times in quick succession (this works with other tones too but is more noticable on the longer ones)
